thread.title: Derrick Rose made his preseason debut in Bulls' 103-102 win over Mavericks
thread.title_full: Derrick Rose made his preseason debut in Bulls' 103-102 win over Mavericks

title: Derrick Rose made his preseason debut in Bulls' 103-102 win over Mavericks
text:
Derrick Rose made his preseason debut in Bulls' 103-102 win over Mavericks THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   10:45   10:45   
People: 
Men's sports (2326) 
LINCOLN, Nebraska â€” Derrick Rose made his preseason debut, playing just over 10 minutes, and Doug McDermott hit a fallaway jumper with 1 second left to give the Chicago Bulls a 103-102 victory over the Dallas Mavericks on Friday night. 
Rose played about 5 minutes in both the first and second quarters. He had 8 points on 4-of-6 shooting. Rose had been sidelined since fracturing his left orbital bone on Sept. 29. 
Bulls: Taj Gibson had 16 points and seven rebounds while Tony Snell and Nikola Mirotic had 14 points each. 
Mavericks: Dirk Nowitzki led the Mavs with 19 points. Dwight Powell had 14 points and grabbed nine rebounds. Zaza Pachulia had 12 points and seven rebounds. 
Up next: The Bulls will host Cleveland to open the regular season Tuesday. Dallas will open the regular season at Phoenix on Wednesday.
